title: HLL Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for 09 Lab Technician, Staff Nurse and Other Posts
description: The HLL Lifecare (HLL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 09 Senior Lab Technicians, Lab Technicians, Radiographers, Staff Nurses, and Medical Microbiologists. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their DMLT, M.Sc., B.Sc., B.Sc Nursing, GNM, or any degree can apply for the HLL Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in inte...
